lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Furthermore, Representatives of the Farm Credit System, commercial bankers and life insurance companies are meeting in an attempt to agree on a method of establishing the market.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A farm secondary market would allow lenders to sell high-quality loans on farmland to "poolers" who in turn would package the loans and issue farm mortgage-backed securities for resale to investors-- called Aggie-mae by some supporters.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Commercial banks and life insurance companies are the main supporters of a farm loan secondary market because they believe it would allow private lenders to compete more effectively in rural lending with the quasi-government farm credit system, traditionally the largest lender to farmers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Furthermore, Representatives of the Farm Credit System, commercial bankers and life insurance companies are meeting in an attempt to agree on a method of establishing the market.
